dsOverview.title: TOGA/COARE Ocean Mixing Data

summary.p: This dataset contains ocean mixing data obtained during TOGA COARE. For other TOGA COARE data archives, see the UCAR/EOL TOGA COARE Project Page, which contains links to other archives.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/COARE > TOGA COARE Data Information System, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
